Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class BookshelfUtilities

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.BookshelfUtilities
public final class BookshelfUtilities extends Object
This class contains some methods to create a bookshelf.

      public static Layout createProblematicLayouts(Bookshelf b, int variant)
      This method creates problematic layouts in the bookshelf Please refer to the documentation for more information about the specific layouts
      Parameters:
      b - the bookshelf
      variant - the variant of the layout (between 0 and 11)
      Returns:
      the correct layout goal to be checked
